verbose_text: Apixaban and Rivaroxaban are two factor Xa (FXa) inhibitors approved for anticoagulation in the United States.6 Their rapid onset and offset make bridging therapy unnecessary which is a convenient peri-procedural option.14 In contrast to VKAs, FXa can potentially prevent de novo thrombi and resolve established ones by directly inhibiting free and thrombus associated FXa.
